page.title: 14THE BALBY FISHERMAN
page.content: My leisure time is taken up with fishing. When I arrive home from school on Friday afternoon I get all my fishing gear ready to make an early start on Saturday. I have 4 fishing rods made out of fibre glass and 2 landing nets for bringing the fish in. I have 2 keep nets to put the fish in. I go fishing with my cousin who lives in nearby Hexthorpe. We have a quarter of a pound of maggots each for bait. We fish on the River Trent in Lincolnshire. My grandmother lives near the River. We arrive at about 10am and always leave by 6pm. We catch different kinds of fish including bream and roach. We do not harm them and always throw them back into the river. It's a grat sport and recreation.
